item.title: MIUI OS1.0.18.0.UMPMIXM Fastboot update for POCO X5 5G Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO X5 5G Global

Codename: moonstone

Version: OS1.0.18.0.UMPMIXM | 14.0

MD5: 35e9d635d11d142997a8983c7814532e

[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to June 2025. Increased system security.

item.title: MIUI V14.0.3.0.TMPRUXM Recovery update for POCO X5 5G Russia
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: POCO X5 5G Russia

Codename: moonstone

Version: V14.0.3.0.TMPRUXM | 13.0

Size: 3.5 GB

MD5: df176e58eab46e87982f667136c91d2e

Changelog:
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 13
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2023. Increased system security.
[More features and improvements]
Search in Settings is now more advanced. With search history and categories in results, everything looks much crisper now.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.1.0.UMPIDXM Recovery update for POCO X5 5G Indonesia
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: POCO X5 5G Indonesia

Codename: moonstone

Version: OS1.0.1.0.UMPIDXM | 14.0

Size: 3.9 GB

MD5: 7733dc62d61c08b9aa281ee3331b0254

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2024. Increased system security.
[Vibrant aesthetics]
Global aesthetics draw inspiration from life itself and change the way your device looks and feels
New animation language makes interactions with your device wholesome and intuitive
Natural colors bring vibrancy and vitality to every corner of your device
Our all-new system font supports multiple writing systems
Redesigned Weather app not only gives you important information, but also shows you how it feels outside
Notifications are focused on important information, presenting it to you in the most efficient way

Download: Here
